channel.title: Comments on: The Bitcoin Podcast #249: Brian Fabian Crain

item.title: By: Brian Crain
item.dc:creator: Brian Crain
item.description:
Thanks for having me on guys!
In case someone wants to check out Epicenter: https://epicenter.tv/
And, of course, there is Chorus One. Our website: https://chorus.one/ Blog: https://blog.chorus.one/ Telegram group: https://chorus.one/telegram
Stop by if you are interested in Cosmos & proof-of-stake.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for having me on guys!

In case someone wants to check out Epicenter: https://epicenter.tv/

And, of course, there is Chorus One.
Our website: https://chorus.one/
Blog: https://blog.chorus.one/

Stop by if you are interested in Cosmos & proof-of-stake.
